sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { StyleSheet, Image, Text, View, ImageBackground } from 'react-native';
import { useRoute, useNavigation } from '@react-navigation/native';
import theme, { colors } from '../style.js';
import { Icon } from 'react-native-elements';
import CustomButton from './Button';

export default function SideMenu() {
  const navigation = useNavigation();
  const route = navigation.getState().routes[0].name;

  console.log(route);

  return (
    <View style={styles.SideMenu}>
      <View style={styles.TableViewRow}>
        <View style={styles.Container}>
          <View style={styles.Labels}>
            <Text style={theme.Title}>David Coon</Text>
          </View>
        </View>
        <Icon
          name='close-outline'
          type='ionicon'
          color={colors.black}
          size={42}
          styles={{
            marginRight: 16,
            flex: 1,
            color: colors.black,
            fontSize: 20,
          }}
          onPress={() => navigation.goBack()}
        />
      </View>
      <View style={styles.MenuItems}>
        <View
          style={[
            styles.ParticlesMenuItem,
            route.name === 'Announcements' && styles.ParticlesMenuItem1,
          ]}
        >
          <View style={styles.Item}>
            <View style={styles.Label}>
              <Text style={[theme.MenuItem]}>Announcements</Text>
            </View>
          </View>
        </View>
        <View
          style={[
            styles.ParticlesMenuItem,
            route.name === 'Donations' && styles.ParticlesMenuItem1,
          ]}
        >
          <View style={styles.Item2}>
            <View style={[styles.Label]}>
              <Text style={styles.Txt194}>Donations</Text>
            </View>
          </View>
        </View>
        <View
          style={[
            styles.ParticlesMenuItem,
            route.name === 'Stocks' && styles.ParticlesMenuItem1,
          ]}
        >
          <View style={styles.Item}>
            <View style={[styles.Label]}>
              <Text style={[theme.MenuItem]}>Blood stocks</Text>
            </View>
          </View>
        </View>
      </View>
      <View style={styles.ParticlesMenuItem3}>
        <View style={styles.Item6}>
          <Image
            style={styles.Icon}
            source={{
              uri: 'https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/unify-bc2ad.appspot.com/o/fzomupse2ei-117%3A294?alt=media&token=1b84f917-aa0e-45cb-8822-c27ce9f792bd',
            }}
          />
          <View style={styles.Labels3}>
            <Text style={styles.Txt517}>Settings</Text>
          </View>
        </View>
      </View>
    </View>
  );
}

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
  SideMenu: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    alignItems: 'flex-start',
    paddingTop: 49,
    paddingBottom: 0,
    paddingLeft: 0,
    paddingRight: 159,
    width: 390,
    height: 844,
  },
  TableViewRow: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'row',
    justifyContent: 'space-between',
    alignItems: 'center',
    paddingTop: 0,
    paddingBottom: 0,
    paddingLeft: 15,
    paddingRight: 31,
    marginBottom: 40,
    width: 390,
    height: 96,
  },
  Container: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'row',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    alignItems: 'center',
    paddingTop: 11,
    paddingBottom: 11,
    paddingLeft: 15,
    paddingRight: 15,
    width: 214,
    height: 96,
  },
  Thumb: {
    width: 52,
    height: 48,
    marginRight: 8,
  },
  Labels: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    alignItems: 'flex-start',
    flex: 1,
    width: 122,
  },

  RemixIconsLineSystemCloseLine: {
    width: 18,
    height: 18,
  },

  MenuItems: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    alignItems: 'flex-start',
    marginBottom: 40,
    width: 390,
  },
  ParticlesMenuItem: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    alignItems: 'flex-start',
    paddingTop: 0,
    paddingBottom: 0,
    paddingLeft: 15,
    paddingRight: 0,
    marginBottom: 10,
    width: 390,
  },
  Item: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'row',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    alignItems: 'center',
    paddingTop: 9,
    paddingBottom: 9,
    paddingLeft: 15,
    paddingRight: 15,
    width: 374,
    height: 44,
  },
  Label: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    alignItems: 'flex-start',
    flex: 1,
    width: 342,
  },

  ParticlesMenuItem1: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    alignItems: 'flex-start',
    paddingTop: 0,
    paddingBottom: 0,
    paddingLeft: 15,
    paddingRight: 0,
    marginBottom: 10,
    backgroundColor: colors.orange,
  },
  Item2: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'row',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    alignItems: 'center',
    paddingTop: 9,
    paddingBottom: 9,
    paddingLeft: 15,
    paddingRight: 15,
    width: 133,
    height: 44,
  },
  ActiveLabel: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    alignItems: 'flex-start',
    flex: 1,
    width: 101,
  },
  Txt194: {
    fontSize: 20,
    // fontFamily: "Outfit, sans-serif",
    fontWeight: '600',
    lineHeight: 24,
    letterSpacing: 0.4,
    color: 'rgba(243,243,243,1)',
    width: 102,
  },

  ParticlesMenuItem2: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    alignItems: 'flex-start',
    paddingTop: 0,
    paddingBottom: 0,
    paddingLeft: 15,
    paddingRight: 0,
    width: 390,
  },
  Item: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'row',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    alignItems: 'center',
    paddingTop: 9,
    paddingBottom: 9,
    paddingLeft: 15,
    paddingRight: 15,
    width: 374,
    height: 44,
  },
  Labels1: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    alignItems: 'flex-start',
    flex: 1,
    width: 342,
  },
  Txt712: {
    fontSize: 20,
    // fontFamily: 'Outfit, sans-serif',
    fontWeight: '600',
    lineHeight: 24,
    letterSpacing: 0.4,
    color: 'rgba(0,0,0,1)',
    width: 343,
  },

  ParticlesMenuItem3: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    alignItems: 'flex-start',
    paddingTop: 0,
    paddingBottom: 0,
    paddingLeft: 15,
    paddingRight: 0,
    width: 230,
  },
  Item6: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'row',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    alignItems: 'center',
    paddingTop: 9,
    paddingBottom: 9,
    paddingLeft: 11,
    paddingRight: 15,
    width: 214,
    height: 36,
  },
  Icon: {
    width: 30,
    height: 30,
    marginRight: 8,
  },
  Labels3: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'row',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    alignItems: 'flex-start',
    flex: 1,
    width: 148,
    height: 22,
  },
  Txt517: {
    fontSize: 20,
    // fontFamily: 'Outfit, sans-serif',
    fontWeight: '600',
    lineHeight: 24,
    letterSpacing: 0.4,
    color: 'rgba(0,0,0,1)',
    width: 149,
    height: 23,
  },
});
